name: DreamTank
description: All the action-packed VR games wearing you down? Check out DreamTank, an interaction-light sweeping musical journey through snapshots of distant worlds, randomly generated and unique with each playthrough! What will you see when you enter the DreamTank?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1060 or equivilant Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 or equivalent Storage: 1 GB available space
